content: ever since i learned larger significance of ground hogs day how it fits directly between the winter solstice and the equinox-- it s become a favorite holiday yes it s still winter but the light is returning now at a gallop instead of a creep the sap is beginning to rise in the trees- you can tell by the way the snow melts around the trunks rumor has it the burrowing animals are giving birth to their young spring isn t here yet but it will come this pattern makes good use of leftover yarn from other projects i have large hands you may want to modify by using smaller needles or lighter weight yarn or fewer stitches any multiple of 4 will work
